hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
UPDATE EO_DELIVERY_RECEIPT EODE SET EODE_RECEIPT_CUSTOMER_CODE=:eodeReceiptCustomerCode,EODE.EODE_RECEIPT_CUSTOMER_NAME=:eodeReceiptCustomerName, EODE.EODE_RECEIPT_TIME=:eodeReceiptTime,EODE.EODE_RECEIPT_TIME_RESERVE=:eodeReceiptTimeReserve, EODE.EODE_REC_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_CODE=:eodeRecCustomerContactCode,EODE.EODE_REC_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NAME=:eodeRecCustomerContactName, EODE.EODE_REC_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_TEL=:eodeRecCustomerContactTel, EODE.EODE_STATUS_CODE = :eodeStatusCode, EODE.EODE_STATUS_NAME = :eodeStatusName
WHERE EODE.EODE_ID=:eodeId
